name: Hunajatta
desc: A merchant from Nasha Town, who creates sugar sculptures.

customize.text: <color=#ffffff73>You can obtain one random sculpture once a day. It expires in 24 hours. Some characters can obtain special sculptures.</color>

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Puffin
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture modeled after an animal. With a quiet and gentle demeanor, it's a Puffin resting atop a cliff.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Frostfin Whale
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture modeled after an animal. With a graceful leap, it's a Frostfin Whale playing above the water's surface.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Chic Badger
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture modeled after an animal. With a sturdy and honest appearance, it's a Chic Badger hiding in the bushes.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Dualblaze Longplume Ibis
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture modeled after an animal. With wings spread wide, it's a Dualblaze Longplume Ibis soaring across the sky.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Rimehorn Deer
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture modeled after an animal. With a peaceful pose, it's a Rimehorn Deer standing serenely in the forest.

customize.name: Aino
customize.desc: A genius mechanic and inventor from Nod-Krai who loves interesting machines and sweet treats.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Aino
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture crafted to capture a person's essence. The playful and cute design brings to mind Aino, the whiz-kid mechanic.

customize.name: Ineffa
customize.desc: A multifunctional robot containing integrated mechanical components from various nations. The Source Core in her chest has endured the passage of countless years.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Ineffa
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture crafted to capture a person's essence. The calm and reliable little robot brings to mind Ineffa, the mechanical maid.

customize.name: Lauma
customize.desc: A Maiden blessed by moonlight and the grove alike, hope born to the Frostmoon Scions.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Lauma
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture crafted to capture a person's essence. The elegant and sacred marks bring to mind Lauma, the Maiden of the Grove.

customize.name: Flins
customize.desc: A Lightkeeper of Nod-Krai, guardian of a lighthouse and graveyard on a northern isle. An enigmatic gentleman, cultured and courtly.

customize.name: Sugar Sculpture: Flins
customize.desc: A sugar sculpture crafted to capture a person's essence. The ancient, lonely lamp brings to mind Flins, standing guard by the graves.
